Question: Gerrymandering split this person's territory among three neighboring districts.
Hints: On February 7, 2012, this person came in last place in the Minnesota Republican caucuses with about 10.7% of the vote.
This person Communications promoted This person’s public appearances, including his Fox News contract and his website, newt.org.
After a recount this person prevailed by 980 votes, or a 51% to 49% result—all but assuring him of election in November.
